titles.title: If Baca's Valley Proves A Well To Me (difficul

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}If "Bacca's Valley" proves a "well" to me It is because my Father's will I see Proving that love behind each sorrow dwells And sorrow's pathway only mercy spells{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Love's pressure brings out fragrance rare and sweet Because beneath the weight Himself I meet And in the sunshine of His blessed face There flows from me some answer to His grace{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Then chastening proves the love remains the same As when it first to plough its furrows came But room is left when self is turned aside To let the fragrance of that love abode{/lang-eng}
